author: stahlleiton
body:
#### PR description:

This PR modifies the HGCal SoA rechit producer to support the processing of testbeam data and allows to run offline reconstruction (up to layer clusters at the moment). In addition it sets up a new relval using as input 2024 HGCal test beam data, which requires the following cms-data PRs: https://github.com/cms-data/Geometry-HGCalMapping/pull/4 and https://github.com/cms-data/RecoLocalCalo-HGCalRecProducers/pull/1

@pfs @IzaakWN 

#### PR validation:

This PR can be tested using relval 77 with cms-data PRs https://github.com/cms-data/Geometry-HGCalMapping/pull/4 and https://github.com/cms-data/RecoLocalCalo-HGCalRecProducers/pull/1
title: Adapt HGCal rechit producer for HGCal testbeam data
